page.title: 16DAY IN LIFE OF BOY, AGED 8.
page.content:
A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JODY, AGED 8.
I get up at 7:00am and have Weetabix for{breakfast}Then I get dressed in my school clothes and clean my teeth.Then it is 7:45am. I go upstairs and write about 3 computer programs which takes 45 minutes.Then Sue takes me to {school.}Groups go to Science,Maths & English.We have{dinner}at 12:00.noon, go out to play at 12:30pm for an hour.We have Assembly till 2:00pm then choose till 2:40pm then get ready for P.E. this takes half an hour.At 3:30pm I go{home,}get changed,then go to my friend Paul's to play.I come home at 5:00 to have my {tea}and sometimes go back afterwards. When I come home I watch T.V.,then clean my teeth and go to{bed}about 8:00pm.
